ccre.cluck.tcp

Class CluckProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.cluck.tcp.CluckProtocol

  • public class CluckProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
    A static utility class for handling various encodings of Cluck packets.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static long checksum(byte[] data, long basis)
      Calculate a checksum from a basis and a byte array.

      Start a Cluck connection.
      protected static void handleRecv(java.io.DataInputStream din, java.lang.String linkName, CluckNode node, CluckLink denyLink)
      Start a receive loop from the specified Connection input, link name, node, and link to deny broadcasts to.
      protected static CluckLink handleSend(java.io.DataOutputStream dout, java.lang.String linkName, CluckNode node)
      Create and register a cluck link using the specified connection output, link name, and node to get messages from.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • handleHeader

        protected static java.lang.String handleHeader(java.io.DataInputStream din,
                            java.io.DataOutputStream dout,
                            java.lang.String remoteHint)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Start a Cluck connection. Must be ran from both ends of the connection.
        Parameters:
        din - The connection's input.
        dout - The connection's output.
        remoteHint - The hint for what the remote node should call this link, or null for no recommendation.
        Returns:
        What the remote node hints that this link should be called.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.

      • checksum

        protected static long checksum(byte[] data,
            long basis)
        Calculate a checksum from a basis and a byte array.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to checksum.
        basis - The basis initializer.
        Returns:
        The checksum.

      • handleRecv

        protected static void handleRecv(java.io.DataInputStream din,
              java.lang.String linkName,
              CluckNode node,
              CluckLink denyLink)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Start a receive loop from the specified Connection input, link name, node, and link to deny broadcasts to.
        Parameters:
        din - The connection input.
        linkName - The link name.
        node - The node to provide access to.
        denyLink - The link to deny transmits to, usually the link that sends back to the other end of the connection. (To stop infinite loops)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs

      • handleSend

        protected static CluckLink handleSend(java.io.DataOutputStream dout,
                   java.lang.String linkName,
                   CluckNode node)
        Create and register a cluck link using the specified connection output, link name, and node to get messages from. Returns the newly created link so that it can be denied from future receives.
        Parameters:
        dout - The connection output.
        linkName - The link name.
        node - The node to provide access to.
        Returns:
        The newly created link.
